title: lmdb.Error: training/.ipynb_checkpoints: No such file or directory
body:
!python train.py --train_data='training' --valid_data='training' --Transformation='TPS' --FeatureExtraction='ResNet' --SequenceModeling='BiLSTM' --Prediction='Attn'

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Filtering the images containing characters which are not in opt.character
Filtering the images whose label is longer than opt.batch_max_length
['1']

dataset_root: training
opt.select_data: ['/']
opt.batch_ratio: ['1']

dataset_root:    training	 dataset: /
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 305, in <module>
    train(opt)
  File "train.py", line 33, in train
    train_dataset = Batch_Balanced_Dataset(opt)
  File "/content/drive/My Drive/internship/deep_text_recognition_benchmark_master/dataset.py", line 42, in __init__
    _dataset, _dataset_log = hierarchical_dataset(root=opt.train_data, opt=opt, select_data=[selected_d])
  File "/content/drive/My Drive/internship/deep_text_recognition_benchmark_master/dataset.py", line 118, in hierarchical_dataset
    dataset = LmdbDataset(dirpath, opt)
  File "/content/drive/My Drive/internship/deep_text_recognition_benchmark_master/dataset.py", line 135, in __init__
    self.env = lmdb.open(root, max_readers=32, readonly=True, lock=False, readahead=False, meminit=False)
lmdb.Error: training/.ipynb_checkpoints: No such file or directory





but when i do ls -a command in training directory then their it shows .ipynb_checkpoints

please help me out!!!!
